com.robopupu.api.feature

Interface Feature

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PluginComponent, PluginStateComponent, PresenterListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFeature

    public interface Feature
extends PresenterListener, PluginStateComponent
    Feature defines an interface for PluginStateComponents that implement of application feature as a component. A concrete Feature implementation may implement logic for UI navigation and UI flow logic. A Feature is also a DependencyScopeOwner that provides a DependencyScope for providing dependencies.

        void goBack(FeatureTransitionManager transitionManager)
        Goes back to previous View using the given FeatureTransitionManager.
        Parameters:

      • pause

        void pause(boolean finishing)
        Invoked to pause this Feature.
        Parameters:
        finishing - A boolean value indicating if the Feature is going to be finished i.e. it is not resumed nor restarted anymore.

      • finish

        void finish()
        Finishes this Feature. A finished Feature is stopped and destroyed. If a Feature is implements a PluginComponent it is unplugged from a PluginBus.

      • onFeatureContainerStarted

        void onFeatureContainerStarted(FeatureContainer container)
        Invoked when a FeatureContainer has been started.
        Parameters:
        container - A FeatureContainer.

        Parameters:

        finishing - A boolean flag indicating if the FeatureContainer is finishing.

                               boolean finishing)
        Invoked when a FeatureContainer has been stopped.

        container - A FeatureContainer.
